snippet: The finance ministers of the 17 euro zone countries will meet in Brussels to examine Greece’s proposed response to a plan to unlock a long overdue bailout loan installment.
abstract: Euro zone finance ministers will gather for their fourth meeting in four weeks in attempt to vet Greece's planned response to a central provision of new bailout plan; Greece plans to buy back some of its bonds at a discount in order to reduce its staggering debt load.

byline.contributor: Landon Thomas Jr. contributed reporting from London, and Niki Kitsantonis from Athens.

lead_paragraph: The finance ministers of the 17 euro zone countries will meet in Brussels to examine Greece’s proposed response to a plan to unlock a long overdue bailout loan installment.

headline.seo: Greek Debt Is Focus of Another Euro Zone Finance Ministers Meeting
headline.main: European Financial Officials Will Meet, Again, to Address the Greek Crisis
headline.print_headline: European Financial Officials Will Meet, Again, to Address the Greek Crisis
